Posts.Content: On Aug 30, 2013 2:35 AM SpringFlowers wrote: Easy to get cancer out of soft tissue.  Go to Kelmun Protocol.  It does work.  I had many tumors, some 9mm, but constant use of Bkg soda/maple syrup (laugh all you want, but it works), will devour cancer - good to take a 75mg coated asprin, causes cancer cells to congregate together...know several people who have used, we're all doing well.  For mets to bone, cesium chloride, but you need the right cesium, must be pure & from good supplier- add strontium & other select minerals, rubidium, etc.   DMSO is good for pain, the rub on w/rollerball head works best.  Glad the news was good, just keep the info in an if needed compartment... I have read with enthusiasm the Kelmun protocol and am planning to give it a try. ! was diagnosed last 2011 as having early stage prostate cancer and tried a countless alternative cures but no one seemed to work for me. Do you think this protocol will work for me? What about the coated aspirin? Shud i take it at the same time im doing the kelmun? Thank you! Sincerely, Lito
Posts.Title: Sis dx "Breast cancer with mets to bones."
